head.title: World Briefing | Asia: Sri Lanka: Rebels Kill 6 Soldiers In Second Air Raid

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Asia: Sri Lanka: Rebels Kill 6 Soldiers In Second Air Raid

abstract.p: Air raid by Sri Lanka's Tamil separatist rebels on government military base on Jaffna peninsula kills at least six soldiers and wounds 13 others (S)

block.p: An air raid by Tamil separatist rebels on a government military base on the northern Jaffna peninsula killed at least six soldiers and wounded 13 others. The military said it averted a larger attack on the base, at Palaly, by firing at the oncoming aircraft. The rebels unveiled their aerial capacity for the first time last month, when they bombed a military base outside the capital, Colombo, and killed three soldiers.
